review: Limited as it will NOT let you show everything that is ON your Phone or / Tablet, which I thought it would do.I am just So, So happy with this purchase.Other than that it seems like it is made with good quality
author: Alf M,

review: This has worked great for us, at times have to reboot it though but that's easy enough to handle.
author: George Kulczewski

review: This is a great device for video streaming wirelessly from your laptop.  The only problem is that Amazon Prime has yet to get on board with integrating this into their steaming video service.  Netflix and other provider already have.
author: RSM

review: This made our TV a smart TV and it's great not to have to connect our laptop physically to the TV for watching movies.  Great gadget.
author: Jane Cisonno "Jane-O"

review: Just basic. Nothing interesting, Sent it back.
author: MARK SLEPSKI
